member.name: T:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags
member.summary: Enumeration of Attribute Flags

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagNone
member.summary: No special flag

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagTransparent
member.summary: When applied to a container makes the container transparent (i.e. its attributes are directly visible without having to navigate into the container)

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagHidden
member.summary: The attribute is not visible in the user interface property page.

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagTransient
member.summary: The attribute is ignored during save/load.

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagReadOnly
member.summary: The attribute is read-only and cannot be modified by the user.

member.name: F:AGI.Attr.AgEAttrAddFlags.eAddFlagFixed
member.summary: The attribute container has a fixed size. Additions/removals of sub-elements are prohibited.

member.name: T:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrConfig
member.summary: Attributes Configuration Interface

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrConfig.GetConfig(AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder)
member.summary: Get the configuration represented by an attribute container (also called attribute scope).

member.name: T:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder
member.summary: Attribute Automation Builder Interface helps construct an Attribute Scope

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.NewScope
member.summary: Create a new Attribute Scope for use in Attribute Builder method calls

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddIntDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type int to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddLongDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type long to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddStringDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type string to the Attribute Scope. Only allows single line strings. For multi-line strings use AddMultiLineStringDispatchProperty.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddBoolDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type bool to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddFileDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type file (string) to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddDirectoryDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type directory (string) to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddRelFileDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type relative file path (string) to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddDoubleDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type double to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddQuantityDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type quantity (double) to the Attribute Scope. Deprecated, use AddQuantityDispatchProperty2 instead.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddDateDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type date (represented as a double in EpSec) to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.ToString(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize an Attribute scope for a plugin to a formatted XML String representation. (internal use)

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.MergeFromString(System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize an Attribute scope into a plugin from a formatted XML String representation. (internal use)

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddDependencyDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a Dependency between two Attributes within the Attribute Scope provided. Dependencies are used to force the update of the child attribute when the parent attribute is modified by the user.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddFlagsDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a callback to retrieve the flags for the provided Attribute name from the provided property name.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddChoicesDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Array)
member.summary: Add an Attribute that provides a combobox of values from which the user can choose.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddListDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute that represents a list of values.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddVARIANTDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type variant to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddMultiLineStringDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type multi-line string to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.ToFormattedString(System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Get a String representation of the Attribute Scope, formatted using the specified FormatId. (internal use)

member.summary: Add an Attribute of type quantity to the Attribute Scope.

member.summary: Add an Attribute of type quantity to the Attribute Scope.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddScopeDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Add an Attribute to the 'NewDispScope' Scope (to construct a hierarchy).

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddQuantityMinMaxDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an Attribute of type quantity to the Attribute Scope. Deprecated, use AddQuantityMinMaxDispatchProperty2 instead.

member.name: M:AGI.Attr.IAgAttrBuilder.AddChoicesFuncDispatchProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add an Attribute that provides a combobox of values from which the user can choose. Similar to AddChoicesDispatchProperty but uses a callback to get the list of available values instead of a static array of strings.
